thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 8 of 59
thread.title: Randi

author: Randi
title: Randi
text: This is the second vacation we have booked through Jeff. He is very insightful, asking the right questions to have an idea of the vacation we are looking for and helping us book the perfect place and resort. Jeff is very knowledgeable about each resort we discussed and relays feedback from previous customers' experience as well. He honestly listens, is never pushy, and follows up when he says he will!
